trans-unit.source: Please send us a bank wire with:
Please specify your order reference %s in the bankwire description.
trans-unit.target: Navedite broj naloga %s je u opisu bankovnoga plaćanja.

trans-unit.source: We've also sent you this information by e-mail.
trans-unit.target: Također smo Vam poslali te informacije putem e-maila.

trans-unit.source: If you have questions, comments or concerns, please contact our [1]expert customer support team[/1].
trans-unit.target: Ukoliko imate pitanja, komentare ili primjedbe, molimo Vas obratite se našem [1] tim stručnjaka za korisničku podršku [/1].

trans-unit.source: We noticed a problem with your order. If you think this is an error, feel free to contact our [1]expert customer support team[/1].
trans-unit.target: Primjetili smo problem s Vašom narudžbom. Ukoliko smatrate da je greška, možete kontaktirati naš [1] Tim stručne podrške korisnicima [/1].

trans-unit.source: Please transfer the invoice amount to our bank account. You will receive our order confirmation by email containing bank details and order number.
trans-unit.target: Molimo uplatite iznos računa na naš bankovni račun. Primiti ćete potvrdu narudžbe e-mail-om s bankovnim podacima i brojem narudžbe.

trans-unit.source: Goods will be reserved %s days for you and we'll process the order immediately after receiving the payment.
trans-unit.target: Roba će biti rezervirana %s dana za Vas, a mi ćemo obraditi narudžbu odmah nakon prijema uplate.

trans-unit.source: Payment is made by transfer of the invoice amount to the following account:
trans-unit.target: Uplata se vrši prijenosom iznosa računa na sljedeći račun:
